title: (x) SPACE furniture - Helvetica Rounded (customized) {Franz}
content:
okay, i've searched throughly first, so don't blame me if this has already been asked ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525174530im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
   
 [http://www.spacefurniture.com.au/](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525174530/http:/www.spacefurniture.com.au/) looking for the stencil font featured on this site.   
   
right now, i'm assuming that its either a custom logo or a custom exclusive font. i hoping it's available, but whatever shall be, will be ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525174530im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
   
tia, aaron.
author: aeron

comments.content: Well, it's based on [Helvetica Rounded](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525174530/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/helveticarounded/helvetica-rounded-bold/testdrive.html?s=SPACE&p=48).. It's pretty easy to get to that stencil look from there. And if there's just the logo I doubt that there even is a font.
thank you muchly ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525174530im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif) for some reason, i remember the breaks being rounded .. heheh
